languages.text: {n}Эдельтрад издает стрекочущий смешок.{/n} "Едва ли стоит доверять погонщикам безмозглых стад решение столь сложных задач — ресурсы могут быть истрачены в пропорции, геометрически обратной полученному результату... не так ли, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Эдельтрад издает стрекочущий смешок.{/n} "Едва ли стоит доверять погонщикам безмозглых стад решение столь сложных задач — ресурсы могут быть истрачены в пропорчии, геометрически обратной полученному результату... не так ли, {name}?"

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad lets out a high, brittle laugh.{/n} "Such difficult decisions are by no means suitable for those who spend their time cracking their whip at mindless herds — the cost might outweigh the return many times over... isn't that right, {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Эдельтрад издает стрекочущий смешок.{/n} "Едва ли стоит доверять погонщикам безмозглых стад решение столь сложных задач — ресурсы могут быть истрачены в пропорции, геометрически обратной полученному результату... не так ли, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad lets out a shrill laugh.{/n} "Such difficult decisions are by no means suitable for those who spend their time cracking their whip at mindless herds — the expenses might exceed the results manyfold... isn't that right, {name}?"

{n}Edelthrad lets out a shrill laugh.{/n} "Such difficult decisions are by no means suitable for those who spend their time cracking their whip at mindless herds — the expenses might exceed the results manyfold... isn't that right, {name}?"

{n}Edelthrad lets out a high, brittle laugh.{/n} "Such difficult decisions are by no means suitable for those who spend their time cracking their whip at mindless herds — the cost might outweigh the return many times over... isn't that right, {name}?"

{n}Edelthrad lets out a high, brittle laugh.{/n} "Such difficult decisions are by no means suitable for those who spend their time cracking their whip at mindless herds — the cost might outweigh the return many times over... isn't that right, {name}?"

{n}Edelthrad lets out a high, brittle laugh.{/n} "Such difficult decisions are by no means suitable for those who spend their time cracking their whip at mindless herds — the cost might outweigh the return many times over... isn't that right, {name}?"

languages.text: {n}艾德萨德发出了高亢、刺耳的笑声。{/n}“像这种艰难的决定，并不适合那些天天驱赶愚蠢畜群的人来做。如果真的这么做，我们付出的代价，恐怕要比回报高昂很多……不是吗，{name}？”
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad lets out a high, brittle laugh.{/n} "Such difficult decisions are by no means suitable for those who spend their time cracking their whip at mindless herds — the cost might outweigh the return many times over... isn't that right, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾德萨德发出了高亢、刺耳的笑声。{/n}“像这种艰难的决定，并不适合那些天天驱赶愚蠢畜群的人来做。如果真的这么做，我们付出的代价，恐怕要比回报高昂很多……不是吗，{name}？”

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad suelta una risa aguda y frágil.{/n} «Tomar decisiones tan difíciles es algo poco adecuado para quienes pasan sus días fustigando a un rebaño sin mente. El coste podría superar las ganancias con creces... ¿no cree, {name}?».
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad lets out a high, brittle laugh.{/n} "Such difficult decisions are by no means suitable for those who spend their time cracking their whip at mindless herds — the cost might outweigh the return many times over... isn't that right, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad suelta una risa aguda y frágil.{/n} «Tomar decisiones tan difíciles es algo poco adecuado para quienes pasan sus días fustigando a un rebaño sin mente. El coste podría superar las ganancias con creces... ¿no cree, {name}?».

languages.text: {n}エデルスラドは高らかに乾いた笑い声を上げた。{/n}「そのような難しい決断は、烏合の衆に鞭打って時間を無駄にしている人には決して適していない。利益の何倍にも上る対価を払うことになるかもしれない…そうでしょう、{name}？」
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad lets out a high, brittle laugh.{/n} "Such difficult decisions are by no means suitable for those who spend their time cracking their whip at mindless herds — the cost might outweigh the return many times over... isn't that right, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}エデルスラドは高らかに乾いた笑い声を上げた。{/n}「そのような難しい決断は、烏合の衆に鞭打って時間をムダにしている人には決して適していません。利益の何倍にも上る対価を払うことになるかもしれません…そうでしょう、{name}？」
{n}エデルスラドは高らかに乾いた笑い声を上げた。{/n}「そのような難しい決断は、烏合の衆に鞭打って時間を無駄にしている人には決して適していない。利益の何倍にも上る対価を払うことになるかもしれない…そうでしょう、{name}？」

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad laisse échapper un rire sec.{/n} « Ce genre de décision n'est pas à la portée de ceux qui passent leur temps à faire claquer leur fouet devant des troupes sans cervelle. Vous ne pensez pas que le coût serait bien supérieur au bénéfice, {name} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad lets out a high, brittle laugh.{/n} "Such difficult decisions are by no means suitable for those who spend their time cracking their whip at mindless herds — the cost might outweigh the return many times over... isn't that right, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad laisse échapper un rire sec.{/n} « Ce genre de décision n'est pas à la portée de ceux qui passent leur temps à faire claquer leur fouet devant des troupes sans cervelle. Vous ne pensez pas que le coût serait bien supérieur au bénéfice, {name} ? »

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad lacht kieksend und trocken.{/n} "Derart schwierige Entscheidungen sind nichts für solche, die ihre Peitsche vor hirnlosen Herden knallen lassen – die Kosten überwiegen vielfach den Gewinn ... habe ich nicht recht, {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad lets out a high, brittle laugh.{/n} "Such difficult decisions are by no means suitable for those who spend their time cracking their whip at mindless herds — the cost might outweigh the return many times over... isn't that right, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad lacht kieksend und trocken.{/n} "Derart schwierige Entscheidungen sind nichts für solche, die ihre Peitsche vor hirnlosen Herden knallen lassen – die Kosten überwiegen vielfach den Gewinn ... habe ich nicht recht, {name}?"

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad yüksek perdeden, kuru bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Zamanını akılsız sürülere kırbaç şaklatarak geçirenlerin böyle zor kararlar almaya uygun olmadığı muhakkak. Ödenen bedel işin getirisini misliyle aşabilir... Haksız mıyım {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad lets out a high, brittle laugh.{/n} "Such difficult decisions are by no means suitable for those who spend their time cracking their whip at mindless herds — the cost might outweigh the return many times over... isn't that right, {name}?"

languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad lets out a high, brittle laugh.{/n} "Such difficult decisions are by no means suitable for those who spend their time cracking their whip at mindless herds — the cost might outweigh the return many times over... isn't that right, ?"
